Greenwood.White River Township, Johnson County, In:
White River Township is one of nine townships in Johnson County, Indiana. As of the 2010 census, its population was 42,100 and it contained 16,122 housing units.


== Geography ==
According to the 2010 census, the township has a total area of 47.4 square miles (123 km2), of which 47.08 square miles (121.9 km2) (or 99.32%) is land and 0.31 square miles (0.80 km2) (or 0.65%) is water.
